source_sentence: 日食一升餘命八十歲　男女午年字大京子。
translation: At the age of eighty years old, he ate one sheng (eighty yojanas) per day. The male and female bodhisattvas had the Sanskrit phoneme dajingzi.
He was a native of Wuquan.

source_sentence: 日食一石餘命八十五歲　巳未年男女字大東子。
translation: At the age of eighty-five years old, he eats a stone every day and remains alive. His name is Daeongzi (i.e., Great Dongzi).
He belonged to the people of Lianzheng.

source_sentence: 日食一升餘命八十歲　辰申年男女字術不隣子。
translation: He eats one sheng a day and remains for another eighty years old. At the age of Zhixian, he's male and female, and his name is Shunzi.
It belongs to the people of Wenquan星.

source_sentence: 日食四升餘命九十歲　卯酉年男女字微慧字。
translation: He eats four sheng a day and remains ninety years old. The male and female characters of the year are written in the Sanskrit phoneme Weihui.
He belonged to the star-shining people of Luoxiang.

source_sentence: 日食五升餘命八十歲　寅戌年男女字祿存會子。
translation: He ate five sheng a day and lived for another eighty years. At the age of Yinxu, he was a man and a woman named Rouxing Huizi.
They belong to the great star-people of the Great Gate.

source_sentence: 日食八升餘命八十歲　丑亥年男女字貞文子。
translation: He ate eight liters of food every day for the rest of his life for another eighty years. At the age of Śākyamuni, he was a boy and a woman named Zhenwenzi.
They belong to the craving wolf stars and humans.

source_sentence: 日食二升餘命六十五歲　子年男女字司希神子。
translation: The remaining life span is sixty-five years old when he eats two liters of food every day. His sons and daughters are called Śāriputra gods.

source_sentence: 一切如來說破一切宿曜障吉祥真言
translation: All the Tathāgatas teach the auspicious true words for destroying all the constellations and obstacles that obstruct enlightenment.

source_sentence: 慧旭寬延四年書之宥證　明和四亥年以御室真乘院法務前大僧正宥證大和尚本寫挍。
translation: In the fourth year of Huixu Kanyan's reign, in the fourth year of Minghe's reign, he wrote a book for the monk who was formerly a great monk at the Dharma affairs section of the True Vehicle Temple in his royal quarters and correctly appeased him.

source_sentence: 智積院動潮　寬政五丑年以右本書之。

source_sentence: 洛北福勝密寺秀陽享和二壬戌冬以件本挍正上木行於普天。
